amendment.description: Amendment sought to define the term "public health" in the Clean Air Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-540 to define the term "public health" in the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 242 (Roll no. 394).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 242 (Roll no. 394).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Connolly (VA).
